Parking Application

Movie Predictive Model

Developed a predictive model to assess the profitability of films by analyzing key factors such as cast, budget, and ratings. Utilized machine learning methods including Logistic Regression and Random Forest to accurately predict film success based on historical data. The model evaluated various features, such as genre, production costs, and audience reviews, to provide a comprehensive profitability forecast.
